category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Set this to define which team member page this group shows up in.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Any posts from this forum will be used as news
Time in days. News posts older than this will not be listed anymore

Currently there are always 4 entries required (separated by an empty line)
[1] User Group ID to use for member count
[2] Displayed branch name
[3] Displayed subtitle
[4] HTML class for subtitle

Currently there are always 2 entries required (separated by an empty line)
[1] Text
[2] Userrname
[3] Subtitle for user

The branch comes first, placed in its own line, followed by whichever options that should be set, each on their own line
- Possible Branches: "Army", "Air Force", "Marines", "Navy"
- Lines have to start with either of the following keywords followed by a colon: "Icon", "Title", "Description", "Button", "URL"
